speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: So organizers of specific events, a weekend or a heartbeat are those who coordinate everything else to happen, make sure emails are sent and so on.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Facilitators are per event roles that are there to facilitate and catalyze your participation.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: So they're not presenters, they're not speakers, they're not giving a talk.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: They might have some background or some information to share.

speaker: SPEAKER_01

speaker: SPEAKER_01
